item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 3, 2025 at 2:45 AM UTC
item.description:

28. Linux Context Switching Internals: Process State and Memory (101 points | 1 comment)
29. Autodesk deletes old forum posts suddenly (194 points | 120 comments)
